filters.name: Molecule ID
filters.tooltip: Find molecules with a specific Molecule ID, e.g. "mol-45873"

filters.name: Formula
filters.tooltip: Enter a chemical formula to find molecules that have this exact formula. Use the "*" symbol to specify a wildcard element.

props.errorMessage: Please enter a valid chemical formula (e.g. H6C5SO).

filters.name: Include Elements
filters.tooltip: Enter a " , " separated list of element symbols to find molecules that contain at least these elements (e.g. "H,C,N").

props.errorMessage: Please enter a valid list of element symbols separated by a comma.

filters.name: Number of Elements
filters.tooltip: Number of distinct elements in the molecule's formula

filters.name: SMILES
filters.tooltip: Find molecules using the simplified molecular-input line-entry system (SMILES).

props.errorMessage: Please enter a valid SMILES value.

filters.name: Point Group
filters.tooltip: Point group of the molecule in Schoenflies notation
